des:
LP Comfort Connect combines comfort with technology for the ultimate relaxation experience in your smart Leggett & Platt adjustable bed. Use the LP Comfort Connect skill with Alexa to enable simple voice commands that allow your bed to adapt to your comfort needs without the inconvenience of bright phone screens or hard to find remote buttons. With the LP Comfort Connect skill for Alexa, you can control your LP Comfort Connect adjustable bed's position, massage features, and under-bed lighting. Navigate through the LP Comfort Connect app to integrate your adjustable bed base into your smart home and set routines to create a relaxing, rejuvenating bedroom experience. Enjoy comfort and convenience like never before with LP Comfort Connect smart adjustable bed technology from Leggett & Platt.

The LP Comfort Connect skill for Alexa requires an LP Comfort Connect adjustable bed system from Leggett & Platt. You must create an LP Comfort Connect account by using the LP Comfort Connect mobile app, available on all major platforms. Then, you will then need to connect your adjustable bed to Wi-Fi, and link your bed to your LP Comfort Connect account by following the instructions in the LP Comfort Connect mobile app or the manual included with your bed. You will use your LP Comfort Connect account to link this skill to your adjustable bed.

To adjust your bed to your favorite position (Flat, Unwind, Sleep, Wakeup, or Relax), say:
"Alexa, set the bed position to [position]"

To adjust your bed's massage settings, say:
"Alexa, set the massage level to high"

To adjust your bed's underbed light, say:
"Alexa, turn on the bed lights"

For detailed setup and usage instructions, including how to refer to multiple beds linked to your account, refer to the instructions included with your LP Comfort Connect adjustable base, or view a copy with the LP Comfort Connect mobile app or online at https://lpadjustablebeds.com/comfortconnect
